name: brave-search-skill
description: Real-time web search and AI-powered answers using the Brave Search API. Requires BRAVE_SEARCH_API_KEY and BRAVE_ANSWERS_API_KEY environment variables.
author: Broedkrummen

tools.name: brave_search
tools.description: Search the web using Brave Search API. Returns ranked results with titles, URLs, and descriptions. Optionally fetches an AI summary of results.

query.description: Search query. Supports operators: site:, "exact phrase", -exclude

country.description: 2-letter country code for geographic targeting (e.g. us, gb, de)

freshness.description: Date filter: pd (24h), pw (7 days), pm (31 days), py (1 year)

extra_snippets.description: Include up to 5 extra text excerpts per result

summary.description: Fetch AI summarizer result for the search query

tools.name: brave_answers
tools.description: Get AI-powered answers grounded in live Brave web search with inline citations. Use for research questions that benefit from multiple sources.

query.description: Question or research topic to answer

enable_citations.description: Include inline source citations in the answer

enable_research.description: Enable deep multi-search research mode (uses more quota)
